description: Allows the enderman to drop a block they are carrying.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Enderman Leave Block Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the enderman to drop a block they are carrying. Can only be used by Endermen.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
